points.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms
points.quoteText:
Effective Date: January 13, 2005
Last Updated: May 25, 2018

points.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
points.quoteText: Sending you information about updates to your Favorites, new services, new features, promotions, newsletters, and other information (which you can opt out of at any time)

points.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
points.quoteText: In addition to data that you provide, we use tools like cookies and web beacons, as well as analytics services and advertising providers to gather data.

points.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
points.quoteText: We do not currently recognize or respond to browser-initiated Do Not Track signals as there is no consistent industry standard for compliance.

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms
points.quoteText: Last Updated: July 20, 2018

points.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
points.quoteText:
CyberNet's services and all websites linked from it are provided "AS IS" and on an "AS AVAILABLE" basis.
The content and materials are provided "AS IS" and no warranties are made of any kind.

points.title: only for your individual use
points.quoteText: You are granted a limited license to view the content of the products and CyberNet in the privacy of your own home only, and for personal use only.

points.title: Users are subject to the policies and guidelines of the service.
points.quoteText: If you do not agree to abide by these Terms, you are not permitted to access CyberNet's services or order products.

points.title: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
points.quoteText: You are not permitted to attempt to overload, flood, spam, mailbomb, or crash the website or servers.

points.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics
points.quoteText: We use third-party analytics services like Google Analytics and Optimizely on the website.

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
points.quoteText: You agree to subject yourself to the personal jurisdiction, laws and courts of San Francisco, California, in the event of a suspected breach of these Terms.

points.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
points.quoteText: You agree that these Terms may be modified or amended at any time and in any manner, and that you accept the updated Terms at the time they are published on this website.

points.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms
points.quoteText: When you create or update your account, we collect and store the data you provide, like your email address, password, and username, and assign you a unique identifying number (“Account Data”).

points.title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
points.quoteText: You must not intimidate, harass or threaten other users, employees, or contractors of CyberNet.

points.title: Users cannot scrape the website of the service
points.quoteText: You must not use any automated script or other software to collect information or content from CyberNet's sites in any way.

points.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
points.quoteText:
CyberNet, in its sole discretion, may terminate your use and access of its services at any time and for any reason, or no reason if it believes you have violated any of the terms of use.
Any termination may occur without notice to you and CyberNet may immediately deactivate or delete your account.

points.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age
points.quoteText: You agree and affirm that you are of legal age (18 years old in most jurisdictions, 21 in others) to purchase adult, sexually explicit materials in your jurisdiction.

points.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
points.quoteText: CyberNet does not make any warranties as to fitness for any particular use nor does CyberNet make any warranties as to the accuracy of descriptions of the products.

points.title: info given about security practices
points.quoteText:
We employ technical and organizational measures such as firewalls and encryption that are designed to appropriately protect your information that is under our control and that we process on your behalf from unauthorized access collection, use, disclosure, copying, modification or disposal, both during transmission and once we receive it.
We store all information that you provide to us on secure servers.

points.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service
points.quoteText: In order to process your payment we use third party payment processors, including RocketGate and Vendo. Your payment will be processed by RocketGate or Vendo via a payment gateway.

points.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
points.quoteText: We may change this Policy from time to time, and if we do we’ll post any changes, including any material changes, on this page, so please be sure to check back periodically

points.title: This service collects your IP address for location use
points.quoteText: We attempt to determine what country you are accessing the website from based on your IP address (“Geographic Data”).

points.title: The service provides information about how they collect personal data
points.status: Generated through the annotate view; updated to include text that had been annotated elsewhere and couldn't be included in the excerpt.
points.quoteText: How We Collect Information

points.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data
points.status: Generated through the annotate view; updated to include text that had been annotated elsewhere and couldn't be included in the excerpt.
points.quoteText: How We Use the Data We Collect

points.title: This service does not sell your personal data
points.quoteText:
We do not share information about you in any way other than as described in this Privacy Policy. We may share your data with third parties under the following circumstances:

 

With Service Providers, Contractors, and Agents

We share your data with third-party companies who perform services on our behalf, like payment processing, data analysis, fraud detection, marketing and advertising services, email and hosting services, and customer services and support. These service providers may access your personal data and are required to use it solely as we direct, to provide our requested service.

For Analytics 

As part of our use of third-party analytics tools like Google Analytics, we share certain Account Data, System Data, Usage Data (as detailed above), or de-identified data as needed. De-identified data means data where we’ve removed things like your email address and replaced it with a number that is not directly tied to you.

For Security and Legal Compliance

We may disclose your data to third parties if we (in our sole discretion) have a good faith belief that the disclosure is:

  • Required by law;
  • Reasonably necessary as part of a valid subpoena, warrant, or other legally-valid request;
  • Reasonably necessary to enforce our Terms of Use, Privacy Policy, and other legal agreements;
  • Required to detect, prevent, or address fraud, abuse, misuse, potential violations of law (or rule or regulation), or security or technical issues. or
  • Reasonably necessary in our discretion to protect against imminent harm to the rights, property, or safety of our company, our users, employees, or members of the public.
  • We may also disclose data about you to our auditors and legal advisors in order to assess our disclosure obligations and rights under this Privacy Policy.

After Aggregation/De-identification

We can disclose or use aggregate or de-identified data for any purpose. 

With Your Permission

With your explicit consent, we may share data to third parties outside the scope of this Privacy Policy.

points.title: User suspension from the service will be fair and proportionate.
points.quoteText:
General discussion and respectful debate with other users of CyberNet's sites is also welcomed.
  • While moderators might allow some leeway in what is considered to be an acceptable post, crossing certain boundaries may result in your posting being deleted and in extreme or repeated cases, having your access suspended or account nullified.

points.title: Users are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses they may incur by downloading materials
points.quoteText: Any use of CyberNet services is at your own risk and you are solely responsible for any damage to your computer hardware or software or loss of data that occurs during your use of the website regardless of fault, including damage or loss due to viruses, Trojans, or other malware.

points.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
points.quoteText: You agree to indemnify CyberNet and all third parties that are linked to CyberNet and CyberNet's services, and all subsidiaries, affiliates, officers, agents, partners, and employees from any claims or demands made by any third party due to or arising from your use of CyberNet's services, purchase of materials from CyberNet or any third parties linked from CyberNet services, or use of any materials purchased or rented from CyberNet or third parties linked from CyberNet services.

points.title: This service does not force users into binding arbitration
points.quoteText: • Any breach of these Terms could result in harm to properties for which monetary damages would be an inadequate remedy, and therefore, in addition to the remedies otherwise available, including monetary damages, Cybernet will be entitled to equitable relief, including but not limited to injunction, costs, and attorney's fees associated with CyberNet enforcing its rights against you.

points.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
points.status: Generated through the annotate view; updated to include text that was annotated elsewhere and couldn't be included in the excerpt.
points.quoteText:
Summary

We collect information about you when you:

  • Use the website
  • Create an account
  • Make purchases
  • Subscribe to our emails
  • Communicate with us

We also collect information, such as usage statistics, by using cookies, server logs, and similar technologies.

 

Information You Provide to Us

We collect information that you provide directly to us. For example, we collect information that you provide when you create an account, choose a viewing filter, rate or comment on content, add items to your Favorites, communicate with us (via email, a contact form, postal mail, or otherwise), or make purchases on the website.  

Account Data

 

In order to use certain features (like view trailers or make a purchase), you need to create a user account.

points.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
points.quoteText: You have certain rights around the use of your data, including the ability to opt out of promotional emails, cookies, and collection of your data by certain analytics providers.

points.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
points.quoteText: These third-party services may place cookies or other tracking technologies on your computer, phone, or other device and may access those tracking technologies in order to serve these tailored advertisements to you.
